## plugin-team-memberships package

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [TeamMemberships](./plugin-team-memberships.teammemberships.md) | <p>Team Memberships represent a person's relationship to a team. Use this API to list members of any team that you're in or create memberships to invite someone to a team. Team memberships can also be updated to make someone a moderator or deleted to remove them from the team.</p><p>Just like in the Webex app, you must be a member of the team in order to list its memberships or invite people. </p> |
